About

Innovative and enthusiastic developer with a solid theoretical foundation and extensive experience in various research projects and internship activities during the academic tenure. Possessing a broad international perspective and excellent cross-disciplinary communication skills. Proficient in both hardware and software, adept at utilizing languages such as Python, C and verilog, and skilled in common feature processing methods and machine learning algorithms. I have demonstratiing internet-oriented thinking with strong logical reasoning skills to comprehend and address diverse needs across various scenarios.
